title: Queen Emeraldas
synopsis: The story revolves around a race that seeks to dominate the galaxy. A lone mysterious female warrior, known to others as Emeraldas sails the endless planets of the universe- in her Seas of Star ship- fighting the tyranny of that merciless race. She is tormented by the memory of her lost love.
related_anime: ['Torajima no Miime', 'Zero Seiki Movie 1: Emeraldas', 'Queen Emeraldas', 'Maetel Legend', 'Waga Seishun no Arcadia']
